dao

Class ServerInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.ServerInterface

  • public class ServerInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    ServerInterface queries WPI's server for information about airports, airplanes, and flights. All information is returned from the server as an XML string. Additionally, ServerInterface requests server lock and unlock modes as well as flight reservations.
    Author:
    Team G

    • Method Detail

      • getURL

        public java.lang.String getURL()

      • PopulateAirports

        public Airports PopulateAirports()
        Queries WPI's server for a list of airports using HTTP GET request. Calls XML parsing methods to parse XML string returned from server.
        Returns:
        An Airports class containing a list of airports retrieved from WPI's server

      • lock

        public boolean lock()
        Lock the database for updating by the specified team. The operation will fail if the lock is held by another team.
        Returns:
        true if the server was locked successfully, else false

      • unlock

        public boolean unlock()
        Unlock the database previous locked by specified team. The operation will succeed if the server lock is held by the specified team or if the server is not currently locked. If the lock is held be another team, the operation will fail.

        The server interface to unlock the server interface uses HTTP POST protocol

        Returns:
        true if the server was successfully unlocked.

      • GetDepartingFlights

        public Flights GetDepartingFlights(SearchParams searchParams)
        Queries WPI's server for a list of flights departing from a specific airport using HTTP GET request. Calls XML parsing methods to parse XML string returned from server.
        Parameters:
        searchParams - is a SearchParams object containing user specified data necessary for requesting flight information from the server. (Airport code, departure date)
        Returns:
        An Flights class containing a list of flights departing from an airport specified in searchParams and retrieved from WPI's server

      • GetArrivingFlights

        public Flights GetArrivingFlights(SearchParams searchParams)
        Queries WPI's server for a list of flights arriving at specific airport using HTTP GET request. Calls XML parsing methods to parse XML string returned from server.
        Parameters:
        searchParams - is a SearchParams object containing user specified data necessary for requesting flight information from the server. (Airport code, arrival date)
        Returns:
        An Flights class containing a list of flights arriving at an airport specified in searchParams and retrieved from WPI's server

      • PopulateAirplanes

        public Airplanes PopulateAirplanes()
        Queries WPI's server for a list of airplanes using HTTP GET request. Calls XML parsing methods to parse XML string returned from server.
        Returns:
        An Airplanes class containing a list of airplanes retrieved from WPI's server

      • ReserveTicket

        public boolean ReserveTicket(Reservation plan)
        Requests flight reservations from WPI's server for a specific flightPlan using an HTTP POST request. The method considers all legs of a given flightPlan and attempts to reserve a seat for each of the legs.
        Parameters:
        plan - contains information about flightPlan that the user has selected for reservation
        Returns:
        True if the flightPlan was reserved successfully

        False if there are no seats of the chosen seat type left on at least one leg of the flightPlan, or if the database was not locked before request

      • ToLocal

        public FlightPlans ToLocal(FlightPlans rawTimePlans)

      • FailReserve

        public void FailReserve()
